column8: The minimum size of an IP fragment is 28 bytes and for an IP fragment with offset 0 it is 40.
IP fragmentation : a fragment with a size less than 9 bytes (allowed but could be an evasion).
Overlapping IP fragmentation : difference in offset of concomitant fragments less than fragment length (allowed but could be an evasion).
The IP options field must be homogeneous in all IP fragments.
